pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform the Robust Multivariable Mendelian Randomization Analysis // Perform the robust multivariable Mendelian randomization 'robustMVMR' analysis in the two-sample Mendelian randomization setting. The 'robustMVMR' package produces both the robust estimators and the robust standard errors via the MM-estimates, which has been demonstrated to protect against heteroskedasticity, autocorrelation, and the presence of outliers in Yohai (1987) doi:10.1214/aos/1176350366 and Croux (2003) https://EconPapers.repec.org/RePEc:ete:ceswps:ces0316.
